coffeeTypes.title: Cappuccino
coffeeTypes.description: A coffee-based drink made with espresso, hot milk and steamed milk froth

coffeeTypes.title: Latte Macchiato
coffeeTypes.description: The latte macchiato is made of several elements: milk, milk foam and espresso

coffeeTypes.title: Mocaccino
coffeeTypes.description: The mocaccino, also called a “mochaccino” or even “mokaccino”, is a drink made with cappuccino, cream and hot chocolate

coffeeTypes.title: Flat white
coffeeTypes.description: A flat white is an espresso with a coffee to milk ratio similar to a latte and a cappuccino

coffeeTypes.title: Espresso Macchiato
coffeeTypes.description: Is an espresso topped with a small amount of milk and milk foam, similar to a cappuccino, but with a stronger flavour

coffeeTypes.title: Americano
coffeeTypes.description: It is made by filling a cup with hot water and adding in the aforementioned amount of espresso

coffeeTypes.title: Irish Coffee
coffeeTypes.description: It is made using filtered coffee, brown sugar and cream
